name: Laser Looter
description:
Infiltrate alien space stations, Loot valuable treasures, and Zap the inhabitants in this fast-paced ASCII action game.

  • Use EDSF to move and IJKL to shoot.
  • Use SPACE to pause and ESC to quit.
  • Grab as much $ as you can.
  • Grab the fuel tank, hop back into the cockpit, and blast off to another alien space station. (the fuel tank is ASCII char 127, which looks like a tiny pentagonal house)

Submitted to #LOWREZJAM 2020 as a proof of concept. The jam required a game to be 64x64 pixels, which means only 8x8 ASCII characters.

LASER LOOTER will be further developed into a bigger and better game with a higher resolution.

Follow on Twitter:  https://twitter.com/MansterSoft
